body_html:
@lllidan-yuandian Hi，have you solved this? I see you add "flatbuffers" when compiling："/usr/include/flatbuffers/include". Is this need to install additionally?

I have the compiling problem.
The error infomation:
/tensorflow/contrib/lite/schema/schema_generated.h:21:37: fatal error: flatbuffers/flatbuffers.h: No such file or directory
#include "flatbuffers/flatbuffers.h"

Can you tell how the solve the "flatbuffers" problem?
This is my include in cpp file:
#include "tensorflow/contrib/lite/kernels/register.h"
#include "tensorflow/contrib/lite/model.h"
#include "tensorflow/contrib/lite/string_util.h"
#include "tensorflow/contrib/lite/tools/mutable_op_resolver.h"
